short_summary: Installation of a new sanitary system at the Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Cultus Lake Laboratory
description: Work under this Contract comprises construction at the Depart of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)Cultus Lake Fisheries Laboratory and at the Cultus Lake Park in Cultus Lake, British Columbia. Work includes supply and installation of new sewerage system components including gravity collection piping, forcemain piping, manholes, pumps, wet well, connection to existing standby generator, electrical controls and programming.
